title: Weekly Review With Clay and Buck H3 - Jun 4 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review With Clay and Buck H3 - Jun 4 2022
description:
Seattle: hotbed of woke liberal lawlessness. Clay says, "I mean, this is such a colassal failure, the mayor of Seattle should have to resign, right?" Frustrated caller from Seattle tells crime story. MSNBC's Joy Reid trashes gun owners. Will the red wave in November vanquish the woke white virus, which has destroyed the once-pearls of San Francisco, Portland and Seattle? More crime stories from Seattle callers, who are filling up the phone lines. No question, Depp-Heard trial took the attention of the country (and Clay), but Buck asserts, "I like Captain Jack Sparrow as much as the next guy as a character, but beyond that..."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
